channel.title: Xtelestaff?
channel.description:
is it possible to make a command to teleport all the staff that are logged on? ::xtelestaff
like.... rights 1+.
please make me a commands for that, im sooooo lost on it...

item.title: Xtelestaff?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“lmfaoown, post:1, topic:256561”]is it possible to make a command to teleport all the staff that are logged on? ::xtelestaff

like… rights 1+.

please make me a commands for that, im sooooo lost on it…[/quote]

Here you go, add this in the ‘customCommand’ method:

if (command.startsWith("xtelestaff")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p.playerRights > 0) { p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.updateRequired = truel p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

Just typed that so please test to see if it works, it should work though.

Read full topic
